PersonalStatement.text: Jodi Cooper, born on 1984-02-13, is a Female based in Christopherberg, Greenland. She is Divorced and holds Tanzanian nationality. Currently working at Simmons-Li.

WorkExperience.text: Project Manager at James PLC from 2007 to 2020.
Senior Financial Analyst at Simmons-Li, 2022 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Master's in Business Administration from Colegio de México
Master's in Engineering from The Hong Kong Polytechnic University

PersonalSkills.text: Communication: Strong ability to present technical information to non-technical stakeholders.
Innovation: Recognized for introducing novel solutions in data science projects.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, she enjoys photography.
